DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Stances passively gives various effects depending on which you have active.
passively gives you 2 Dexterity and 1 Dexterity, also allows the usage of certain adaptive effects.
passively gives you 2 Strength and 1 Dexterity, also allows the usage of certain adaptive effects.
